) } } function mapStateToProsp({ authedUser, questions, users }, props) { const { id } = props.match.params const question = questions[id] const author = users[question.author] const total_answers = Object.keys(question.optionTwo.votes).length + Object.keys(question.optionOne.votes).length console.log(total_answers) return { id, author, question, } } export default connect(mapStateToProsp)(Result)
